    • Method Detail

      • adjustCoverageInfo

        public static LineCoverageInfo adjustCoverageInfo(LineCoverageInfo coverageInfo,
                                                  ILineAdjuster adjuster,
                                                  ILogger logger,
                                                  java.lang.String appendToErrorMessage)
        Adjusts line coverage information for a file to coverage information for a changed file. The changes to the file are described by a location adjuster. Due to the nature of coverage, each small change could affect the coverage globally, hence this is only a rough approximation. This method is robust w.r.t lines numbers that are out of the range w.r.t. the given LocationAdjuster. Such invalid lines are logged as error to the given logger.
        Parameters:
        coverageInfo - this may be null and then the result is null as well.

      • adjustProbeBasedCoverage

        public static void adjustProbeBasedCoverage(ProbeCoverageInfo probeCoverageInfo,
                                            LocationAdjuster adjuster,
                                            ILogger logger,
                                            java.lang.String appendToErrorMessage)
        Adjusts the line information of the given probole coverage using the specified location adjuster.

      • adjustCoverageToStatements
